title: Tomato

adjectives: In the shape of, or moving in a circle.
Circular or cylindrical; having a circular cross-section in one direction.
Having a circular, cylindrical or spherical shape.
Having an acidic, sharp or tangy taste.
Having an acid, sharp or tangy taste.
Sharp to the taste; acid; sour.
verbs: To consume something solid or semi-solid (usually food) by putting it into the mouth and eventually swallowing it.
To consume (something solid or semi-solid, usually food) by putting it into the mouth and swallowing it.
nouns: Species of plant
Native to South America; widely cultivated in many varieties
The savoury fruit of the Solanum lycopersicum, red when ripe
A tomato.
A widely cultivated plant, Solanum lycopersicum, having edible fruit
The tomato is the edible, often red fruit/berry of the nightshade Solanum lycopersicum, commonly known as a tomato plant.
The ripened reproductive body of a seed plant
Fruit, in broad terms, is a structure of a plant that contains its seeds.
The seed-bearing part of a plant, often edible, colourful/colorful and fragrant, produced from a floral ovary after fertilization.
Part of a flowering plant
A fully matured plant ovary with or without other floral or shoot parts united with it at maturity.
In botany, a fruit is a part of a flowering plant that derives from specific tissues of the flower, one or more ovaries, and in some cases accessory tissues.
In culinary terms, a vegetable is an edible plant or its part, intended for cooking or eating raw.
A plant raised for some edible part of it.
Edible seeds or roots or stems or leaves or bulbs or tubers or nonsweet fruits of any of numerous herbaceous plant
Edible plant or part of a plant
A nutritional and culinary term that denotes any part of a plant that is commonly consumed by humans as food.
Any of various herbaceous plants having parts that are used as food.
The edible part of such a plant.
Any substance consumed to provide nutritional support for the body. For prepared ready-to-eat food, use dish: Q746549.
Any substance consumed by living organisms to sustain life.
Food.
Any substance that can be consumed by living organisms, especially by eating, in order to sustain life.
Any solid substance (as opposed to liquid) that is used as a source of nourishment
Food is any substance consumed to provide nutritional support for the body.

description: A plump, red garden tomato topped with a leafy green stem. May resemble the red apple at small sizes.
apple_vendor_description: The tomato emoji on Apple devices is a perfectly formed, ripe crimson orb, bursting with vibrant color and a subtle, glossy sheen that hints at its juicy texture. Rendered with Apple's signature realistic lighting and soft, rounded edges, it looks fresh from the vine. This emoji is a delightful representation of fresh ingredients, healthy eating, or simply adding a splash of culinary warmth to any digital message.
